speaker: goldblum
text: Alright owen, today we're making chocolate balls!

speaker: goldblum
text: They're these beautiful little truffle-like confections, very... sophisticated.

speaker: owen
text: Sounds brilliant! I'm ready, mate!

speaker: goldblum
text: Perfect! So first, we need to melt the chocolate. Very gently.

speaker: goldblum
text: We'll use a double boiler. Do you know what that is?
emo_text: slightly condescending but trying to be helpful

speaker: owen
text: Uh... not really? Can't we just zap it in the microwave?

speaker: goldblum
text: No! No, no, no. That'll ruin it completely.

speaker: goldblum
text: We need... controlled, gentle heat. Like a warm embrace for the chocolate.

speaker: owen
text: A warm embrace. Right.
emo_text: slightly amused but going along with it

speaker: owen
text: So I just put a bowl over a pot of water?

speaker: goldblum
text: Exactly! You're getting it!

speaker: owen
text: Alright, water's heating up. Now what?

speaker: goldblum
text: Now you stir. Constantly. Don't stop stirring.

speaker: owen
text: Like this?

speaker: goldblum
text: Yes! Perfect! Keep that motion, nice and... wait, is it getting lumpy?

speaker: owen
text: Lumpy? I don't know, you tell me!

speaker: owen
text: It looks a bit... clumpy? Maybe?

speaker: goldblum
text: Oh no. No, no, no.

speaker: goldblum
text: Stir faster! More vigorously!

speaker: owen
text: I AM stirring! My bloody arm is about to fall off!

speaker: goldblum
text: Well you can't stop now! Here, let me add the cream.

speaker: goldblum
text: Hand me that measuring cup. The one right there.

speaker: owen
text: Which one? This one?

speaker: owen
text: Oh bugger, I'm spilling the chocolate!

speaker: goldblum
text: owen!

speaker: owen
text: You asked me to hand you something while I'm stirring!

speaker: owen
text: I've only got two hands, mate!

speaker: goldblum
text: Okay. Okay, it's fine.

speaker: goldblum
text: We'll just... work with what we have. It'll be fine.

speaker: owen
text: It looks really runny, Jeff.

speaker: goldblum
text: That's... that's probably normal. Maybe.

speaker: goldblum
text: Let's add the butter. That should help thicken it.

speaker: owen
text: How much butter?

speaker: goldblum
text: Uh... all of it? Let's just use all of it.

speaker: owen
text: You sure about that?

speaker: goldblum
text: Yes! No. Maybe. Just... put it in.

speaker: owen
text: This is madness.

speaker: goldblum
text: It's not madness, it's... creative adaptation!

speaker: owen
text: Right. Now what?

speaker: goldblum
text: We refrigerate it. For... a while.

speaker: goldblum
text: Maybe two hours? Until it firms up.
emo_text: uncertain and hoping for the best

speaker: owen
text: Maybe? You don't actually know, do you?

speaker: goldblum
text: I... look, we changed the ratios when you spilled, so I'm improvising here!

speaker: owen
text: Oh, so this is MY fault now?

speaker: goldblum
text: I didn't say that!

speaker: owen
text: You literally just said 'when YOU spilled'!

speaker: goldblum
text: Let's just... put it in the fridge. Please.
emo_text: exhausted and wanting to end the argument

speaker: owen
text: Fine.

speaker: owen
text: I'm getting a drink.

speaker: goldblum
text: Two hours later... Okay! Let's see how our chocolate balls turned out!

speaker: owen
text: Jeff...

speaker: goldblum
text: What? What is it?

speaker: owen
text: It's still liquid. Completely liquid.

speaker: goldblum
text: No. No, that's... that's impossible.

speaker: goldblum
text: We followed the... well, we mostly followed...

speaker: goldblum
text: This is chocolate soup.

speaker: owen
text: Well...

speaker: owen
text: It tastes good at least. Here, have a spoon.

speaker: goldblum
text: I suppose... chocolate soup isn't the worst thing.

speaker: goldblum
text: Though it's certainly not what I had envisioned.

speaker: owen
text: Next time, mate...

speaker: owen
text: Maybe we stick to something simpler. Like toast.

speaker: goldblum
text: Toast. Yes.

speaker: goldblum
text: I think that's probably... very wise.
